thread.section_title: La Manufacture - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: La Manufacture
thread.title_full: La Manufacture - Review of La Manufacture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Steven W
title: La Manufacture
text: We decided to take a quick trip to Paris for the weekend and looked for a hotel centrally located with good airport and metro connections at a good price. La Manufacture was one of the first that fit our criteria, so we went with them. The hotel was highly satisfactory, and fit as we expected. I would say you can't go wrong with this hotel.
